title: EP41: How to use option strategies in DeFi to reduce risk | 3 DeFi Options Strategies
description:
Responding to the twitter poll, you guys want more finance and #DeFi explanations. So instead of assuming you know how to use #option strategies to help with risk management, let's do it in this video.   

No overwhelm. Just simple basic strategies for now.   We cover 3 strategies today:  

1. Covered call — think of it as being LP on HEGIC's platform  

2. Married put — think of it as insurance for price falling  

3. Bull spread call — think of it as LP on #HEGIC and insurance for price falling   

Why am I covering this? Because next week's #OPYN's protocol has such strategies available. So it might be useful to understand them when we do the deep dive. It's better to explain to a few who don't know, than to assume everyone knows and skip this!
